Text:
Please post some more PADI videos. I'm especially on the hunt for the Emergency Oxygen Provider, Night Diver and the EFR course.

The manuals for Rescue Diver, Enriched Air/Nitrox, Deep Diver, Wreck Diver, Night Diver would be nice as well. :)

prety sure if got those 3 videos, the manuals are still only in book form. Im waiting for PADI to release e-book versions (i heard of that plan 2 years ago..but nothing yet) so can upload any manuals.

ill upload you the videos as soon as im home, maybe 2-3weeks.
sorry that should read "...can't upload any manuals"
